review: My wireless system is always buffering.  Makes watching any program impossible.  I wish there was a test that you could do BEFORE you bought this to see if it would work with the system you have in your home.

review: It's nice.  Very convenient - but the capability of it receiving WIFI signals is questionable.  Placed it in the TV on the main level about 20 feet from he router - flawless.  Put it in the basement about 40 feet from the router - can't find a signal - I have WIFI on the phone so I know the router can reach- but the stick can't get anything.  Just be aware of where you might use it and how far from the router.
